pr_title: [JBPM-8998] Adding test classes for "Missing SpringBoot support in NotificationListener"

timeline.message: Adding test classes for Jira ticket: [JBPM-8998] Missing SpringBoot support in NotificationListener

timeline.bodyHTML:
This shouldn't be static, and it's initialized at constructor (I think that's the reason of test failure at CI);

Suggested change
private static List<NotificationEvent> eventsReceived = new ArrayList<NotificationEvent>();
private List<NotificationEvent> eventsReceived;
timeline.author: gmunozfe

replies.bodyText: Done, waiting for Jenkins to rebuild
replies.author: afalhambra
